front.title: Simple and Efficient Binomial Protocols for Differential Privacy in MPC

abstract.t: A method for computing a binomial noise in Multiparty Computation (MPC) is described. The binomial mechanism for differential privacy (DP) is a simple mechanism that is well suited to MPC, where computation of more complex algorithms can be expensive. This document describes how to select the correct parameters and apply binomial noise in MPC.
